item.title: ‘The Senior’ Review: Michael Chiklis Plays a 59-Year-Old College Linebacker in Rod Lurie’s True-Life Sports Fairy Tale
item.description: It’s basically a soft-hearted paint-by-numbers TV-movie, stocked with homilies about what the game of football means next to the game of life. Yet it’s an effective soft-hearted paint-by-numbers TV-mo
